metadata.title: CVE-2017-11099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When SWFTools 0.9.2 processes a crafted file in wav2swf, it can lead to aSegmentation Violation in the wav_convert2mono() function in lib/wav.c.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
